Hillary Clinton has never accomplished anything that has been a benefit to me. She has done things that have negatively impacted my life. Her and Bill's dealings with the laws have put many people in jail for nonsense. I was in boot camp for the military, when she voted to enter the Iraq war. It is obvious that she is against the environment because she is pro fracking. I have watched her straight up lie, under oath, on more than one occasion. Yet somehow she is supposed to be the next president... Hell no!

There isn't life after death. because your bible teaches you this does not necessarily constitute reality. Most religions are culture based, hence most Christians cannot specify why they follow in that faith other than they were born into believing a fictional story written by """"who knows"""" and edited by king James et al...to suite the reader. How different are you from other animals that walk this earth? Same animals that you hunt down and kill to satisfy your thirst and hunger...same animals that share most anatomical composition as we humans, and you tell me those animals are not worthy of your heaven? Nice recitation of Fox news talking points. Have you travelled to Europe and actually talked to foreign people? I travelled to Europe 10 times between 2001-2007, and George Bush was considered a Nazi, much like his father and grandfather. I see no evidence of the Constitution being shredded for Shiria Law. Sharia Law is not very common in the Muslim World, much less in America. That would be like saying, """"America Lynches Black folks"""" based on looking at the Klan in the segregation days. Your whole construct is based on fallacy, therefore you are an Idiot.
